description: Extended query set for robust quality testing - 50+ diverse queries across frameworks

queries.query: I have a counter variable that needs to update the UI when it changes. How do I make it reactive in Vue 3?
I need to show a filtered count based on an array of items. What's the Vue way to derive a value that updates automatically?
queries.intent: Use computed properties for derived state
queries.taskContext: Building a todo list with filter counts

queries.query: How do I make sure a Vue component only accepts valid data? I want to validate that a 'user' prop has name and email fields.
What's the difference between ref() and reactive() in Vue 3? When should I use each?
I need to run some code when a reactive value changes. How do I watch for changes in Vue 3?
queries.intent: Use watch or watchEffect in Vue

queries.query: My child component needs to send data back to its parent. How do I emit custom events in Vue?
queries.intent: Emit events from child to parent

queries.query: I need to fetch data when my Vue component mounts. What's the right lifecycle hook to use?
How do I pass data from a grandparent component to deeply nested children without prop drilling in Vue?
My v-for list isn't updating when I modify an array item. What am I doing wrong?
I want to create a reusable composable that shares state across components. How do I structure this in Vue 3?
How do I conditionally add a CSS class to an element based on component state in Vue?
I need to access the DOM element directly in my Vue component. How do I use template refs?
queries.intent: Use template refs for DOM access

queries.query: My computed property has a setter. How do I make it writable?
How do I clean up event listeners and timers when a Vue component unmounts?
What's the best way to organize a large Vue 3 component using the Composition API?
My Express app crashes when a route throws an error. How do I set up error handling middleware that catches all errors?
queries.intent: Implement centralized error handling in Express
queries.taskContext: Adding production error handling to an API

queries.query: How do I get the userId from a URL like /users/123 in my Express route handler?
My Express app is getting big. How do I split routes into separate files and import them into the main app?
My async database call throws an error in an Express route but the error middleware never catches it. What am I doing wrong?
queries.intent: Handle async errors in Express routes

queries.query: How do I parse JSON body data from POST requests in Express?
I need to check if a user is logged in before allowing access to certain routes. How do I create auth middleware?
How do I serve static files like CSS and images from an Express app?
I want to add logging to every request in my Express app. Where do I put the middleware?
My middleware runs for routes it shouldn't. How does Express middleware ordering work?
How do I set cookies in an Express response?
What's the difference between app.use() and app.get() in Express?
How do I redirect a user to a different URL in Express?
I need to access query string parameters from a URL like /search?q=hello. How do I get them in Express?
How do I set up CORS in Express to allow requests from a different domain?
My Express route returns 404 even though I defined it. How do I debug route matching?
I need a route that matches /api/files/* where * can be any path including slashes. How do I set up a wildcard route in Hono?
I'm building a high-traffic API and considering Hono vs Express. What are the performance differences?
queries.taskContext: Choosing a framework for a new project

queries.query: How do I access the request body as JSON in a Hono route handler?
I need to add authentication to all routes starting with /api. How do I create middleware in Hono?
How do I set response headers in Hono?
What's the c object in Hono route handlers? What methods does it have?
How do I return different status codes in Hono like 201 Created or 404 Not Found?
queries.intent: Set HTTP status codes in Hono

queries.query: My Hono middleware isn't running for some routes. How does Hono middleware scope work?
How do I group related routes together in Hono?
How do I validate request body data in Hono before processing it?
I have a JWT token from the client. How do I verify it's valid and extract the user data from it?
What's the difference between decoding a JWT and verifying it? When should I use each?
How do I create and sign a JWT token with a payload and secret?
My JWT is expiring too quickly. How do I set a longer expiration time?
I want my generic function to only accept objects that have an 'id' property. How do I constrain the type parameter?
I need to make all properties of a type optional. Is there a built-in way to do this in TypeScript?
How do I create a type that extracts the return type of a function in TypeScript?
I want to type a function that can accept either a string or a number. How do I use union types?
TypeScript says a value might be undefined but I know it exists. How do I tell TypeScript it's definitely there?
queries.intent: Use non-null assertion or type guards

queries.query: My useEffect sets up a WebSocket connection. How do I properly clean it up when the component unmounts?
My useEffect runs on every render even though I only want it to run when 'userId' changes. What's wrong?
queries.intent: Understand dependency arrays in React hooks

queries.query: What's the difference between useState and useRef in React?
queries.intent: Understand state vs ref in React

queries.query: I need to share state between multiple components. Should I use Context or prop drilling?
I'm piping streams together with pipeline(). How do I properly handle errors if one of the streams fails?
queries.intent: Handle errors in Node.js stream pipelines

queries.query: My producer is generating data faster than my consumer can process it. How does Node.js handle this backpressure situation?
How do I read a file as a stream in Node.js instead of loading it all into memory?
What's the difference between Buffer and Stream in Node.js?
What's the best way to handle form validation on both client and server?
How do I implement rate limiting for an API endpoint?
My API is getting slow. What are common performance optimizations for REST APIs?
